author: J. Arturo Trujillo
title: Justin Herbert gave luggage and gift cards to the Chargers OL for Christmas | Marca
text:
The Los Angeles Cargers QB has a 5 year contract for 262.5 million dollars
J. ARTURO TRUJILLO 26/12/2024 - 16:05 CST
Compartir en Facebook
Compartir en Twitter

Compartir en Whatsapp
Enviar por email NFL. Jayden Daniels believes Travis Hunter can shine both ways in the NFL Houston Texans. CJ Stroud hasn't been the same player since giving advice to Bears rookie I t seems to be a tradition between the NFL quarterbacks to give something back to the most underrated players on the field; the OL.
Earliert this hollidays we have seen gifts like the one from Brock Purdy to his teammates, even when he still has a rookie contract. This time, the Chargers QB. Justin Herbert, gave to his whole OL a nice small gift.
Rashawn Slater sends his thanks to Justin Herbert after receiving cheap X-mas gift
He give a luggage and a $5K Delta giftcard , which social media started making jokes and comparissons with other QBs gifts around the X-mas season.
Justin Herbert tired of the Chargers? Chargers fans, known for their passionate support, were disappointed when quarterback Justin Herbert, despite his recent signing of a massive $262 million contract, allegedly displayed less than generous tipping behavior.
Ver esta publicaciÃ³n en Instagram This perceived stinginess sparked a wave of playful posts in online comment sections, with fans jokingly questioning Herbert's 'Christmas spirit' and playfully accusing him of 'penny-pinching.'
For the last weeks, they have been plenty of temas that have been related to the young QB, Oregon alumni. One of them the Seattle Seahawks who need to fill out the position with a true winner.
